introduction.paragraph: The DMC-S1KDTOOLS-A-22-00-00-00A-040A-D_EN-CA document is a part of the S1000D standard, which provides guidelines for creating and managing technical documentation.

description.paragraph: The s1kd-dmrl tool reads S1000D data management lists and creates CSBD objects for the entries specified using the s1kd-new* tools.

generalInformation.paragraph: The s1kd-dmrl tool is used to process S1000D data management lists and create CSBD objects.

option.name: -$, --issue <issue>
option.description: Specify which issue of S1000D to use when creating objects.

option.name: @, --out <dir>
option.description: Create new objects in <dir>.

option.name: %, --templates <dir>
option.description: Use XML templates in the specified directory instead of the built-in templates of each of the s1kd-new* tools.

option.name: -D, --dmtypes <path>
option.description: Specify the .dmtypes file name.

option.name: -d, --defaults <path>
option.description: Specify the .defaults file name.

option.name: -F, --fail
option.description: Fail on the first error generated by any of the s1kd-new* commands. Normally, errors with individual DMRL entries will be reported but the other entries will still be processed.

option.name: -f, --overwrite
option.description: Overwrite existing CSDB objects.

option.name: -h, -?, --help
option.description: Show help/usage message.

option.name: -m, --use-remarks
option.description: Use the remarks for an entry as the remarks for the new CSDB object.

option.name: -N, --omit-issue
option.description: Omit issue/in-work numbers from the filenames of created CSDB objects.

option.name: -q, --quiet
option.description: Do not report errors when any of the CSDB objects already exist.

option.name: -s, --commands
option.description: Do not create CSDB objects, only output the s1kd-new* commands to create them.

option.name: -v, --verbose
option.description: Print the filenames of newly created CSDB objects.

option.name: --version
option.description: Show version information.

option.name: <DML>...
option.description: One or more S1000D data management lists.

option.name: --dtdload
option.description: Load the external DTD.

option.name: --huge
option.description: Remove any internal arbitrary parser limits.

option.name: --net
option.description: Allow network access to load external DTD and entities.

option.name: --noent
option.description: Resolve entities.

option.name: --parser-errors
option.description: Emit errors from parser.

option.name: --parser-warnings
option.description: Emit warnings from parser.

option.name: --xinclude
option.description: Do XInclude processing.

option.name: --xml-catalog <file>
option.description: Use an XML catalog when resolving entities. Multiple catalogs may be loaded by specifying this option multiple times.

example.description: This command processes the S1000D data management list DML-EX-12345-C-2018-00001_001-00.XML and creates CSBD objects for the entries specified using the s1kd-new* tools.
